name: Production of DR4
description: This projects centers around problems and incidents during production of the DR4 car.

name: Production of DR5
description: Problems and incidents during production of the DR5 car are collected and solved one by one.

name: Supply Chain Management
description: Management and optimization of supply chain processes, including procurement, storage, transportation, and logistics.

name: Facility Management Nuremberg
description: Responsible for the operation, maintenance, and organization of building and production plant infrastructure at the Nuremberg site.
